name: product.toml
rawContent:
# Product Entity

[entity]
id = "product"
name = "Product"
description = "Catalog product item"
table = "products"

[[fields]]
name = "id"
type = "string"
format = "uuid"
primary = true
description = "Unique product identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "name"
type = "string"
required = true
minLength = 1
maxLength = 200
description = "Product name"

[[fields]]
name = "slug"
type = "string"
unique = true
required = true
description = "URL-friendly identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "description"
type = "text"
required = false
description = "Product description"

[[fields]]
name = "price"
type = "number"
format = "decimal"
min = 0
required = true
description = "Product price"

[[fields]]
name = "currency"
type = "enum"
values = ["USD", "EUR", "RUB"]
default = "USD"
description = "Price currency"

[[fields]]
name = "stock"
type = "integer"
min = 0
default = 0
description = "Available quantity"

[[fields]]
name = "images"
type = "array"
items = "string"
format = "url"
description = "Product image URLs"

[[fields]]
name = "category"
type = "relation"
target = "category"
required = false
description = "Product category"

[[fields]]
name = "isPublished"
type = "boolean"
default = false
description = "Visibility status"

[[fields]]
name = "createdAt"
type = "datetime"
auto = "create"

[[fields]]
name = "updatedAt"
type = "datetime"
auto = "update"

[relations]
entities = ["category"]
pages = ["products"]
components = ["product-card"]

[implementation]
interface = "Product"
file = "core/app/src/pages/prototype/ProductsPage.tsx"
mock = "core/app/public/generated/mocks/products.json"
preview = "/prototype/products"
status = "implemented"
